attributes.additional_details: death penalty should be brought back for convicted terrorists, mass murderers, serial rapists, paedophiles and child killers. No appeal should be allowed, with no right to legal aid, which must be lodged and heard within 2 months of conviction.
attributes.background: Bring back for death penalty for these sick people. Prison is too easy on them.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Reintroduce the Death Penalty for certain offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/554914
